generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, which is the primary surface for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian path is visible on the right side of the road, separated by a curb and lined with trees.
- building: A large brick building is visible in the background, along with some industrial-looking structures on the left.
- fence: A chain-link fence runs along the left side of the road, separating the road from the industrial buildings.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including those supporting overhead wires and possibly traffic lights.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, near the traffic light.
- vegetation: Numerous trees are visible along both sides of the road, with some leaves on the ground.
- terrain: Grass and fallen leaves are visible on the right side of the road, forming a grassy area.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible on a motorcycle in the distance, riding on the road.
- rider: A person is riding a motorcycle on the road, which qualifies as a rider.
- car: A red car is visible in the foreground, driving on the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible in the distance, being ridden by a person.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
